item.title: Logitech Anywhere MX switch fixes, like an amateur
item.description: If you own one of these beauties, then get ready for some switches trouble. Don't get me wrong, I <3 this mouse, I have two (one for work, one for home), but seriously Logitech, couldn't you put better switches in it, so they don't die after less than a year of hard use? :-/ There are plenty of tutorials and videos about the issues with these switches and Google is your best pal there, so I won't get into details.
